name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
Results-driven Senior Cloud Engineer with 8 years of extensive experience in cloud technologies, specializing in **AWS**, **EC2**, **S3**, **ECS**, **RDS**, **VPC**, **IAM**, **CloudWatch**, **CloudFormation**, **Terraform**, **Ansible**, **Kubernetes**, and **Docker**. Proficient in **CI/CD**, monitoring, logging, alerting, and implementing serverless architecture. I possess a robust background in scripting with **Python**, **Bash**, and **PowerShell**, allowing me to automate processes and enhance system efficiency.

My proven track record includes leading the development of performance-driven solutions in the healthcare and financial sectors. I have integrated AI/ML capabilities for predictive analytics and implemented modern frameworks such as **React**, **Next.js**, **Node.js**, and **FastAPI**. Additionally, I have built secure applications that comply with standards like HIPAA, FHIR, PCI DSS, and SOC 2, ensuring the highest levels of data integrity and security. Adept at developing machine learning pipelines and infrastructure, I leverage tools such as **MLflow**, **Airflow**, and **Kubeflow** to optimize MLOps workflows.
